A delivery truck needs to visit 5 different locations in a city. The travel time between each location is shown in the table below:

| Location | 1     | 2     | 3     | 4     | 5     |
|----------|-------|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| 1        | 0     | 12    | 10    | 8     | 15    |
| 2        | 12    | 0     | 6     | 10    | 9     |
| 3        | 10    | 6     | 0     | 3     | 7     |
| 4        | 8     | 10    | 3     | 0     | 11    |
| 5        | 15    | 9     | 7     | 11    | 0     |

What is the optimal route the truck should take to visit all 5 locations and return to its starting point, assuming the starting point is location 1 and the travel time between locations is the only factor to be optimized?
